feed.title: GutenKu Blog
feed.subtitle: Articles about AI haiku generation and classic literature

entry.title: GutenKu Technical Deep-Dive
entry.summary: A deep technical exploration of GutenKu's genetic algorithm, NLP scoring system, and self-learning neural network. How evolutionary computation creates haiku from classic literature.

entry.title: GutenKu: When Two Frauds Make a Truth
entry.summary: I discovered Dimitri Rataud's "Haiku Marinière" on Instagram and immediately thought: "This is brilliant... and possibly a bit of bullshit."

entry.title: GutenGuess: The Daily Literary Puzzle
entry.summary: A Wordle-inspired literary game where you guess which classic book hides behind today's verses. One guess per day, same challenge for everyone.
